pages.text: A $(item)Collector Drone/$ is a specialized non-programmable type of $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$ which should be deployed on, or next to, any inventory. It will collect nearby items and put them in that inventory.$(p)Like any other Drone, they require $(l:base_concepts/pressure)air/$ to operate, and will automatically seek out a $(l:machines/charging_station)Charging Station/$ if low on air.

pages.title: Item Filtering
pages.text: The $(thing)Collector Drone/$ has some basic item filtering functionality. If placed $(italic)on/$ an inventory (i.e. shift-clicked against the inventory block), it will filter on any items that are already in that inventory (if the inventory is empty, it won't filter items). If placed $(italic)next to/$ an inventory, it also won't filter items.$(p)If you want to change what the drone filters, you will need to wrench it and redeploy it.

The $(thing)Collector Drone/$ has a default range of a 17x17x17 cube, centered on the block it was placed at. This range can be increased by adding up to 16 $(l:base_concepts/upgrades#range)Range Upgrades/$.
